General.Name: Delpha Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Delpha Construction Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, constructs commercial buildings in Taiwan. The company is also involved in the sale and lease of public housing; development of land; upholstery industry; and real estate agency, rental, and investment activities. Delpha Construction Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1960 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
